bibl.title: Hellenistic Kings, War, and the Economy.
bibl.note: "I wish to react against the frequent tendency to separate topics that are related." - Revised version of a paper delivered at seminars in St. Andrews and at the Institute of Classical Studies in London.
bibl.seg: Austin M.M., Hellenistic Kings, War, and the Economy.

"I wish to react against the frequent tendency to separate topics that are related." - Revised version of a paper delivered at seminars in St. Andrews and at the Institute of Classical Studies in London.
